Cos he did a Low class thing that damaged the Brand’s image
Drive around suntec area makes me feel like I’m driving F1 🤭🤭🤭
Your vtec sure get you there in 3 hours
Must park in sepang pits straight
but just now  a black merc horned me and high beam me cos i cut into his lane without looking
it was my fault for not checking
he high beam me was good leh
then i gestured to the driver that i am sorry
ok la... i was in the wrong anyway
